# Query Profile & History                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
True or False: Query ID's are unique across all Snowflake deployments and can be used in communication with                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Snowflake Support to help troubleshoot issues.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. True<br>B. False                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The statement is True. Snowflake generates unique Query IDs for every query executed within its system.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
These IDs are not just unique within a single Snowflake account or region, but they are globally unique across                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
all Snowflake deployments. This global uniqueness is a fundamental design aspect of the platform. This                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
feature allows Snowflake Support to quickly and accurately identify the exact query that a user is referring to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
when troubleshooting issues. When you contact Snowflake Support, providing the Query ID allows them to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
directly access the execution details, including the SQL statement, execution time, resources used, and any                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
errors encountered. This enables significantly faster and more effective problem resolution. Without globally                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
unique IDs, support would face substantial challenges in pinpointing specific queries across the vast,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
distributed Snowflake environment. This is a key aspect of the scalability and reliability that Snowflake offers.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Relying on descriptive information such as time of execution or user name can be ambiguous and would not                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
accurately identify the single query in question. The ability to track and analyze specific queries via globallyunique Query IDs is crucial to Snowflake's architecture, particularly with its cloud-native distributed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
approach.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Relevant Documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Snowflake documentation on Query IDs: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-queryhistory.html#query-ids                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
The Query History in the Snowflake Web Interface (UI) is kept for approximately:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. 60 minutes<br>B. 24 hours<br>C. 14 days<br>D. 30 days<br>E. 1 year                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C, 14 days. Snowflake retains query history in the Web UI for a period of 14 days by                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
default. This history includes details about executed queries, such as the query text, user who executed it,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
start and end times, and other execution metrics. This time limit is a built-in feature of the platform's auditing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
and monitoring capabilities, designed to provide a recent view of query activity for debugging and analysis.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
While Snowflake offers query history through other methods like the QUERY_HISTORY view, the Web UI                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
retains it for a shorter period. The 14-day limit serves as a compromise between providing useful recent data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
and managing storage costs and performance. Information older than 14 days will still be available through                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
other mechanisms, but is not displayed directly in the web UI's Query History. Users needing longer retention                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
should utilize those other mechanisms for tracking historical query data. Options A, B, D, and E are incorrect                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
as they do not reflect the default retention period of the Web UI query history in Snowflake. The specific 14day limit helps facilitate efficient troubleshooting and performance analysis. This period also avoids                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
overloading the UI with a massive backlog of historical information.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
For further research, refer to the official Snowflake documentation on query history:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake Query History                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Snowsight query history                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
When reviewing a query profile, what is a symptom that a query is too large to fit into the memory?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. A single join node uses more than 50% of the query time<br>B. Partitions scanned is equal to partitions total<br>C. An AggregateOperator node is present<br>D. The query is spilling to remote storage                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is D. The query is spilling to remote storage. Here's a detailed justification:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
When a Snowflake query's memory requirements exceed the available resources, the system resorts to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
"spilling" data to remote storage (typically cloud storage like S3 or Azure Blob Storage). This is a clear                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
indication that the query is too large to fit entirely within memory. This process involves writing intermediate                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
data sets to storage and reading them back during query execution.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Option A is incorrect; a join node using a significant portion of query time might indicate inefficient join                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
strategies or large data sizes but not necessarily memory overflow. Option B is also incorrect; partitions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
scanned being equal to partitions total means the query scanned all relevant data and is not related to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
memory problems. Option C is incorrect; the presence of an AggregateOperator is normal and does not                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
suggest the query is too large for memory.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Spilling introduces significant latency as it involves I/O operations that are much slower than in-memory                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
processing. This can drastically increase the execution time of the query. The query profile in Snowflake will                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
explicitly show when spilling occurs, often highlighting it as a performance bottleneck. Efficient query design                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
aims to minimize or avoid spilling by using filters, efficient join methods, and potentially partitioning or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
clustering tables.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Key takeaway is that spilling is a direct consequence of memory limitations, whereas other options can be                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
related to different performance factors.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Authoritative Links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Documentation on Query Profile: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-query-profile Specifically, look for sections discussing memory usage and spilling.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Snowflake Performance Tuning: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/performance-tuning - This                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
section provides an overview of potential performance bottlenecks and how to optimize queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What is an advantage of using an explain plan instead of the query profiler to evaluate the performance of a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
query?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. The explain plan output is available graphically.<br>B. An explain plan can be used to conduct performance analysis without executing a query.<br>C. An explain plan will handle queries with temporary tables and the query profiler will not.<br>D. An explain plan's output will display automatic data skew optimization information.                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B: An explain plan can be used to conduct performance analysis without executing a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
query. Here's a detailed justification:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Explain plans provide a breakdown of how Snowflake intends to execute a query, outlining the steps involved                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
in retrieving and processing data. Critically, this plan is generated without actually running the query. This is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
invaluable for identifying potential performance bottlenecks before incurring the cost and time associated                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
with execution. You can see if a full table scan is happening when an index would be more appropriate.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
The query profiler, in contrast, requires the query to be executed. It analyzes the query execution after it has                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
completed, providing detailed runtime statistics about each operation. While the profiler is extremely useful                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
for pinpointing performance issues in already executed queries, it's not suitable for preemptive analysis.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Running an explain plan also has no costs associated with it.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Option A is incorrect because while Snowflake's web interface provides a graphical representation of the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
query profile, it doesn't offer a graphical output for the explain plan itself. The explain plan output is typically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
textual or in JSON format.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Option C is incorrect. Both explain plans and the query profiler can handle queries involving temporary tables.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Temporary tables simply exist for the duration of the session or query in which they are created.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Option D is also incorrect. While Snowflake automatically performs data skew optimizations, the explain                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
plan's primary focus isn't to display detailed data skew optimization information. The profiler contains this                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
information. It outlines the intended execution path, not necessarily the specific optimizations applied to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
address skew.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
In summary, the key advantage of an explain plan is its ability to predict query performance issues before                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
execution, offering a cost-effective and time-saving method for query optimization.Snowflake Documentation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
on EXPLAINSnowflake Documentation on Query Profile                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
In the query profiler view for a query, which components represent areas that can be used to help optimize query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
performance? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Bytes scanned<br>B. Bytes sent over the network<br>C. Number of partitions scanned<br>D. Percentage scanned from cache<br>E. External bytes scanned                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A, C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct options that directly relate to optimizing query performance in Snowflake's Query Profiler are                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Number of partitions scanned (C) and Percentage scanned from cache (D).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Here's the justification:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Number of partitions scanned (C): Snowflake organizes data into micro-partitions. When a query executes,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Snowflake aims to scan only the relevant partitions. If a query scans a high number of partitions relative to the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
total number available, it suggests inefficient filtering or missing clustering keys. Reducing the number of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
partitions scanned is a key optimization goal. This can be achieved by adding appropriate WHERE clauses,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
leveraging clustering, or using materialized views. Scanning fewer partitions directly reduces the amount of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
data that Snowflake needs to process, leading to faster query execution.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Percentage scanned from cache (D): Snowflake's caching mechanism stores frequently accessed data in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
memory (both warehouse and result cache). A high percentage of data being scanned from the cache                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
indicates efficient data reuse and significantly faster query times because retrieving data from cache is much                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
faster than retrieving it from storage. Conversely, a low cache hit rate implies that data is not being efficiently                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
reused, potentially because the data is not accessed frequently or the cache is getting invalidated or the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
warehouse is too small. Increasing the percentage scanned from cache improves efficiency.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Options A (Bytes scanned) and B (Bytes sent over the network) are important metrics, but they are results of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
the underlying processing, not levers you directly manipulate for optimization. While reducing bytes scanned                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
indirectly improves performance, it is achieved by reducing partitions scanned. Reducing bytes sent over the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
network is important for client response time but is not a primary concern of the query profiler. Bytes scanned                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
is a general metric reflecting the overall data processed, which is a symptom of inefficiency if partitions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
scanned is too high. External bytes scanned (E) would be relevant if your query involved external tables.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Therefore, the focus should be on reducing the number of partitions scanned and increasing the percentage                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
scanned from the cache.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Supporting Links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake Documentation on Query Profiling: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-queryprofile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Snowflake Documentation on Data Clustering: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/tables-clustering-keys.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Snowflake Documentation on Caching: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/querying-using-cache.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
A sales table FCT_SALES has 100 million records.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The following query was executed:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
SELECT COUNT (1) FROM FCT_SALES;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
How did Snowflake fulfill this query?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Query against the result set cache<br>B. Query against a virtual warehouse cache<br>C. Query against the most-recently created micro-partition<br>D. Query against the metadata cache                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is D. Query against the metadata cache.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Here's a detailed justification:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Snowflake's architecture leverages metadata extensively for query optimization. When a COUNT(1) query is
