Here's a detailed justification:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Snowflake executes queries within virtual warehouses, which are compute resources that have a finite                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
amount of memory. During query processing, intermediate results are generated as data moves through                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
various stages like filtering, joins, and aggregations. These intermediate results are typically held in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
warehouse's memory for efficient processing. When the memory allocated to the warehouse is insufficient to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
hold all these intermediate results, Snowflake resorts to spilling data to disk. This disk I/O is significantly                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
slower than memory access, leading to the long query runtime observed by the user.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Option A is incorrect because the result cache stores the final query results, not intermediate ones. While a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
full result cache can impact performance for subsequent identical queries, it wouldn't cause spilling during                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
the initial query execution. Option B is also incorrect as the cloud storage staging area is primarily for data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
loading and unloading, not for storing intermediate results of query execution. Option C is a red herring.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Clustering affects how data is physically stored and accessed on disk, impacting performance during data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
reads from storage but doesn't directly cause spilling of intermediate results during query processing within                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
the warehouse.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
In summary, disk spilling is a direct consequence of insufficient warehouse memory to handle the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
intermediate data generated by a query. Snowflake automatically manages data spills, but the performance                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
penalty can be significant. To resolve this, users can consider scaling up the warehouse to provide more                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
memory or optimizing the query itself to reduce the amount of intermediate data generated.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
For further research, you can consult the official Snowflake documentation on warehouse sizing and query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
performance:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Snowflake Documentation on Warehouse Sizing: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/warehousesconsiderations                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Snowflake Documentation on Query Performance: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/queryprofiling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Snowflake Blog on Query Optimization: https://www.snowflake.com/blog/top-5-query-optimizationtechniques-in-snowflake/                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which function is used to profile warehouse credit usage?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. AUTOMATIC_CLUSTERING_HISTORY<br>B. MATERIALIZED_VIEW_REFRESH_HISTORY<br>C. WAREHOUSE_LOAD_HISTORY<br>D. WAREHOUSE_METERING_HISTORY                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is D. WAREHOUSE_METERING_HISTORY. This function is specifically designed to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
provide detailed information about the credit consumption of Snowflake warehouses. Snowflake utilizes a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
credit-based billing system, and understanding how these credits are used is crucial for cost management                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
and resource optimization. WAREHOUSE_METERING_HISTORY allows users to track the credits consumed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
by each virtual warehouse over time. This includes data about the total credits used, the start and end time of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
usage, and the specific user or role responsible. It enables administrators to identify usage patterns, spot any                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
unexpected spikes in consumption, and make informed decisions about warehouse sizing and scaling. Option                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
A, AUTOMATIC_CLUSTERING_HISTORY, tracks the history of automatic reclustering operations on tables,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
not warehouse credit usage. Option B, MATERIALIZED_VIEW_REFRESH_HISTORY, records details about                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
materialized view refreshes, not overall warehouse credit consumption. Option C,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
WAREHOUSE_LOAD_HISTORY, focuses on the history of loading data into tables using a specific warehouse,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
rather than the total credit usage of a warehouse. Therefore, only WAREHOUSE_METERING_HISTORYdirectly addresses the question of profiling warehouse credit usage, making it the correct choice. For further                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
information, please refer to Snowflake's official documentation: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sqlreference/functions/warehouse_metering_history.html and https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/costunderstanding.html.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What is a characteristic of the Snowflake query profiler?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. It can provide statistics on a maximum number of 100 queries per week.<br>B. It provides a graphic representation of the main components of the query processing.<br>C. It provides detailed statistics about which queries are using the greatest number of compute resources.<br>D. It can be used by third-party software using the query profiler API.                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B because the Snowflake query profiler's primary function is to visually represent the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
execution plan of a query, breaking it down into its constituent operations and stages. This graphical                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
representation allows users to understand the flow of data, identify bottlenecks, and optimize query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
performance. Each node in the graph represents an operation, and the connections show how data moves                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
between these operations. The profiler displays details such as the execution time, the number of rows                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
processed, and other relevant statistics for each operation. This allows users to quickly pinpoint the most                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
resource-intensive parts of the query.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Option A is incorrect because the query profiler doesn't limit itself to analyzing only a specific number of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
queries per week. It can be used on any query executed in Snowflake. Option C is related, but not the primary                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
characteristic. While the profiler helps identify resource-intensive queries, its core function is the graphical                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
breakdown. Option D is also incorrect; while Snowflake does offer robust APIs, the profiler itself isn't primarily                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
designed to be driven by third-party software through a dedicated API, though metadata about queries can be                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
accessed through other mechanisms. The visual representation is its key distinguishing feature.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
For further research on the Snowflake query profiler, refer to the official Snowflake documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Query Profile: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-query-profile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
How long is a query visible in the Query History page in the Snowflake Web Interface (UI)?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. 60 minutes<br>B. 24 hours<br>C. 14 days<br>D. 30 days                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C. 14 days. Snowflake's Query History page in the web interface displays information                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
about queries executed within the last 14 days. This period offers a balance between providing sufficient                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
historical context for performance analysis, debugging, and auditing, while also managing the storage and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
processing overhead of maintaining extensive query logs. While Snowflake retains historical data for a more                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
extended time period in its internal metadata, the UI specifically surfaces the most recent 14 days for ease of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
access and practical use. After 14 days, queries are no longer viewable directly through the web interface's                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
history tab. However, these older queries are still stored and can be accessed using SQL queries against the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ACCOUNT_USAGE schema or via other data access mechanisms. This data retention approach aligns with                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
common cloud database practices, balancing accessibility with resource efficiency. The 14-day window in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
UI offers a quick way to check for recent query performance, identify errors, and track user activity within a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
reasonable timeframe. The full query history remains accessible through SQL for more in-depth historical                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
analysis.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
For more information, refer to the Snowflake documentation on query history:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Snowflake Query History Documentation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake Using the Query History Page                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Where can a Snowflake user find the query history in Snowsight?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Admin<br>B. Activity<br>C. Dashboards<br>D. Data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B. Activity. In Snowflake's Snowsight interface, query history is accessed through the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Activity section. This section is specifically designed to provide users with insights into the various operations                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
and actions performed within their Snowflake account, including executed queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Within the Activity section, users can typically filter and sort query history based on various criteria such as                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
user, warehouse, query text, execution time, and status. This capability allows users to trace and analyze past                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
queries, diagnose performance issues, and understand resource utilization. The Activity section displays                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
crucial information, such as the start and end times of queries, their duration, any errors encountered, and the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
amount of resources consumed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Other sections, like Admin, Dashboards, and Data serve different purposes. The Admin section is for account                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
management tasks, such as user and security settings. Dashboards provides data visualization and reporting,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
and Data is where users interact with the tables, views, and other data objects. These are not the designated                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
areas to access query history.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Therefore, the Activity section is the singular location within Snowsight where Snowflake users can readily                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
find their query history, making it the appropriate choice.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
For further research and verification, refer to the official Snowflake documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake Documentation - Query History: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-snowsightactivity.html (This link specifically leads to the Activity Page, where query history is located within theSnowsight Interface.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
The following SQL statements have been executed:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
What will the output be of the last select statement?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. 3<br>B. 4<br>C. 7<br>D. 8                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
C 7 is the answer, 1, 3, 5 and last select query will return 7                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
A Query Profile shows a UnionAll operator with an extra Aggregate operator on top.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
What does this signify?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Exploding joins<br>B. Inefficient pruning<br>C. UNION without ALL<br>D. Queries that are too large to fit in memory                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The presence of an Aggregate operator atop a UnionAll operator in a Snowflake query profile strongly                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
suggests that a simple UNION (without the ALL keyword) was used in the query. Here's why:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
UNION ALL directly concatenates the result sets of the individual queries combined by the operator. It does                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
not perform any deduplication. Snowflake simply stacks the rows from each query on top of each other. This is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
efficient because it avoids extra processing.However, UNION (without ALL) implicitly performs deduplication. It removes duplicate rows from the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
combined result set, which requires comparing all rows from all source queries. To achieve this deduplication,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Snowflake adds an Aggregate operator. The Aggregate operator groups all identical rows, effectively                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
counting each distinct combination, and then returns the unique rows. This is computationally more expensive                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
than UNION ALL.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Option A is incorrect because exploding joins typically manifest as Cartesian products or joins with                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
significantly more output rows than input rows, not necessarily with an Aggregate operator after a UnionAll.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Option B is incorrect because inefficient pruning usually impacts scan operators, making them read more data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
than necessary; it doesn't directly create an Aggregate after a UnionAll. Option D is incorrect; while a query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
being too large might cause spillover to disk (indicated in other areas of the profile), the presence of an extra                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Aggregate atop a UnionAll specifically points to the need for deduplication due to using UNION instead of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
UNION ALL.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Therefore, the extra Aggregate operator atop the UnionAll serves as a clear indicator that UNION (which                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
performs deduplication) was used instead of the more efficient UNION ALL. Understanding Snowflake's query
