<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is D, REST_EVENT_HISTORY. This view provides a log of all REST API calls made to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Snowflake, which includes requests from identity providers utilizing SCIM (System for Cross-domain Identity                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Management) to manage users and groups. Option A, ACCESS_HISTORY, focuses on data access events                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
within Snowflake, not API calls from external systems. LOAD_HISTORY, option B, tracks data loading                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
activities. Option C, QUERY_HISTORY, logs SQL query executions. SCIM is a REST-based protocol; therefore,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
SCIM API requests from an identity provider to Snowflake appear as REST API calls within Snowflake.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Administrators can examine the REST_EVENT_HISTORY view, including the EVENT_TIMESTAMP,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
USER_NAME, and REQUEST_URI columns to analyze the incoming SCIM requests, helping them monitor,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
audit, and troubleshoot integration issues between Snowflake and an identity provider. Specifically,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
successful or failed user and group management operations via SCIM can be traced, making                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
REST_EVENT_HISTORY the ideal tool for this purpose. The view captures details such as the request type                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
(POST, GET, PUT, DELETE), the HTTP status code, and any error messages associated with each SCIM API                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
call.

---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What information is included in the display in the Query Profile? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Index hints used in query<br>B. Credit usage details<br>C. Clustering keys details<br>D. Details and statistics for the overall query<br>E. Graphical representation of the query processing plan                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D, E</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The Query Profile in Snowflake provides detailed insights into the execution of a specific query, aiding in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
performance analysis and optimization. Option D, "Details and statistics for the overall query," is correct as                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
the profile presents aggregate information such as the total execution time, the number of rows processed,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
and the overall query status. This allows users to assess the overall efficiency of the query. Option E,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
"Graphical representation of the query processing plan," is also correct. The Query Profile visualizes the plan                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
as a tree-like structure, showing how different operations (e.g., table scans, joins, aggregations) are executed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
in sequence or in parallel. This visual representation is crucial for understanding data flow and identifying                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
performance bottlenecks. Options A, B, and C are incorrect. Index hints (A) are not directly displayed in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
profile, as Snowflake's query optimization primarily leverages its metadata-driven engine and does not                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
require user-specified hints. While credit usage (B) is important for cost management, it is not the primary                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
focus of the Query Profile itself, although it can be found in other monitoring areas. Finally, clustering key                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
details (C) are part of table metadata and not a dynamic aspect of query execution presented in the profile.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
The primary purpose of the Query Profile is to diagnose how Snowflake processed the data to serve the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
requested information. Snowflake's documentation offers detailed information on Query Profiles. For more                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
details, consult the official Snowflake documentation: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-queryprofile.html and https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/explain.html . These links demonstrate the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
graphical plan and query statistics.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which function should be used to find the query ID of the second query executed in a current session?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Select LAST_QUERY_ID(-2)<br>B. Select LAST_QUERY_ID(-1)<br>C. Select LAST_QUERY_ID(1)<br>D. Select LAST_QUERY_ID(2)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is D, SELECT LAST_QUERY_ID(2). The LAST_QUERY_ID function in Snowflake is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
designed to retrieve the query ID of a previously executed query within the current session. It takes an integer                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
argument representing the offset from the most recently executed query. A value of 1 retrieves the ID of the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
last query, 2 the second-to-last, and so on. Therefore, to find the query ID of the second query executed in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
current session, we need an offset of 2. Options A, B, and C are incorrect. Option A, LAST_QUERY_ID(-2), is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
not a valid input as the offset must be positive. Option B, LAST_QUERY_ID(-1), is also invalid for the same                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
reason. Option C, LAST_QUERY_ID(1), would provide the ID of the most recently executed query, not the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
second. Snowflake maintains a history of queries within a session, and this function provides access to that                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
history using the specified offset. This is useful for various purposes, including troubleshooting, auditing, and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
debugging. The function's behavior is deterministic based on the execution order within the current session                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
and the offset provided. The LAST_QUERY_ID function is particularly useful in scenarios where you need to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
trace back previous query executions in a session.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
For further research and confirmation of these functionalities, please refer to the official Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
documentation:https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/functions/last_query_id                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What is the default period of time the Warehouse Activity section provides a graph of Snowsight activity?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. 2 hours<br>B. 1 week<br>C. 2 weeks<br>D. 1 month                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C, 2 weeks. The Warehouse Activity section within Snowsight, Snowflake's web                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
interface, displays a time-series graph of warehouse usage and performance metrics. By default, this                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
visualization is configured to show data spanning the past two weeks. This pre-configured timeframe allows                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
users to quickly observe recent trends in warehouse activity, assess performance fluctuations, and identify                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
potential areas for optimization. While options like 2 hours, 1 week, and 1 month may be helpful in certain                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
scenarios, the 2-week default offers a balanced view that captures both daily patterns and longer-term trends                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
without becoming overly granular or too broad. This choice allows for meaningful comparisons and analysis of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
warehouse behavior over a reasonable time period. The ability to examine recent performance is essential for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
effective resource management in a cloud data warehousing environment like Snowflake. Moreover,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
understanding usage trends is a core aspect of cloud computing cost optimization. While users can change                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
the timeframe for analysis, two weeks is the default setting when the section is initially accessed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Authoritative Links:

weeks, it is clearly observable when using Snowsight and exploring the "Warehouse Activity" section.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-snowsight-warehouses#warehouse-activity - Examine this                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
section to visually verify the default timeframe.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Note: The Snowflake documentation might not specify every default setting explicitly, but it is standard                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
practice to default to a reasonable window of time for such monitoring. This answer is based on the actual                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
observed behavior of the Snowsight interface.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
</details>

<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-queryprofile#:~:text=Fraction%20of%20time%20that%20this%20operator%20consumed%20within%20the%                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
20query%20step%20(e.g.%2025%25%20for%20Aggregate%20%5B5%5D).%20This%20information%20is%                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
20also%20reflected%

---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What information is stored in the ACCESS_HISTORY view?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. History of the files that have been loaded into Snowflake<br>B. Names and owners of the roles that are currently enabled in the session<br>C. Query details such as the objects included and the user who executed the query<br>D. Details around the privileges that have been granted for all objects in an account                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C. The ACCESS_HISTORY view in Snowflake is specifically designed to provide                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
comprehensive details about query executions, focusing on the objects accessed and the users involved. This                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
view acts as an audit log, offering insights into data access patterns within the Snowflake environment.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Option C correctly captures this purpose by stating it stores "query details such as the objects included and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
the user who executed the query". This is crucial for auditing, security, and compliance purposes. Option A is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
incorrect as file loading history is tracked elsewhere. Option B is incorrect as information about enabled roles                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
is part of a session context, not the access history. Option D is also incorrect because privilege grants are                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
stored in the account metadata views and not in access logs. The ACCESS_HISTORY view specifically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
captures dynamic access information at the query level. In essence, this view offers a timeline of who                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
accessed what data, and how, providing crucial transparency and accountability in Snowflake. For further                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
research and authoritative information, refer to the official Snowflake documentation on the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ACCESS_HISTORY view: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/account-usage/access_history.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What happens when a user exits Snowsight during a session that a query is running?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Snowflake executes the query during the same session immediately.<br>B. Snowflake cancels any queries submitted during this session that are still running.<br>C. Snowflake will cancel any queries submitted during this session after 24 hours.<br>D. Snowflake will continue to execute and complete upon the next login.                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B. Snowflake cancels any queries submitted during this session that are still running.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Here's the justification:Snowflake, like many database systems, operates with the concept of sessions. A session is a logical                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
connection between a user and the Snowflake service. When a user initiates a query, it's tied to their specific                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
session. If the user exits Snowsight (or any client tool) without explicitly closing the session, that session                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
doesn't automatically become detached from the Snowflake backend; it's still there, technically. However, the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
userâ€™s connection to that session is gone. When Snowsight closes, it does not persist the context of a running                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
query for later retrieval. The query's execution isn't designed to persist indefinitely for a disconnected user.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Instead, to manage resources effectively and prevent queries from running indefinitely without user oversight,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Snowflake defaults to canceling queries associated with the disconnected session.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
This behavior aligns with typical database practices to avoid resource leaks and orphaned processes.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake doesn't automatically persist a session's state and resume it later upon the next login. Therefore,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
answer D, suggesting queries will complete upon next login, is incorrect. Canceling the running query is a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
resource management strategy rather than a delayed cancelation after 24 hours (option C) or a continuation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
as if the user was still connected (option A). This behavior ensures that the Snowflake environment remains                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
efficient and that sessions consume resources only when actively used.

and "Session Handling" for comprehensive information. handling to understand the rationale for automatic query cancellation upon disconnection, specifically in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
cloud-based systems. For example, check database administration forums or documentation for specific                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
database products that describe their session management strategy.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which Snowflake object helps evaluate virtual warehouse performance impacted by query queuing?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Resource monitor<br>B. Account_usage.query_history<br>C. Information_schema.warehouse_load_history<br>D. Information_schema.warehouse_metering_history                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B. Account_usage.query_history. This view within the Snowflake Account Usage                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
schema provides granular details about each query executed, including metrics directly relevant to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
identifying query queuing issues. Specifically, it tracks the QUEUED_PROVISIONING_TIME and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
QUEUED_REPAIR_TIME, which indicate how long queries waited for resources to become available, either for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
initial provisioning or due to scaling activities. These metrics are crucial for understanding if virtual warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
performance is hindered by insufficient compute resources, leading to queuing.
