Resource monitors (A) help                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
control credit consumption but do not directly show queuing details. While                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
INFORMATION_SCHEMA.WAREHOUSE_LOAD_HISTORY (C) provides warehouse load information, it doesn't                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
offer the detailed query-level queuing insights provided by QUERY_HISTORY. Similarly,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
INFORMATION_SCHEMA.WAREHOUSE_METERING_HISTORY (D) focuses on warehouse credit usage but                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
not on specific query queuing times. The Account_usage.query_history gives access to a record of every query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
executed across the account. Therefore, for evaluating performance impacted by query queuing, specifically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
by observing QUEUED_PROVISIONING_TIME and QUEUED_REPAIR_TIME, Account_usage.query_history isthe correct choice. This view facilitates proactive monitoring and identifying areas where warehouse scaling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
or optimization are required to reduce wait times and improve performance. The ability to analyze trends from                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
QUERY_HISTORY empowers data teams to optimize their Snowflake environment.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Authoritative links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Documentation on ACCOUNT_USAGE Schema: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sqlreference/account-usage.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Snowflake Documentation on QUERY_HISTORY View: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/accountusage/query_history.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
A Snowflake user has two tables that contain numeric values and is trying to find out which values are present in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
both tables.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Which set operator should be used?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. INTERSECT<br>B. MERGE<br>C. MINUS<br>D. UNION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is A. INTERSECT. The INTERSECT set operator in SQL, and specifically in Snowflake,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
returns only the rows (or in this case, numeric values) that are found in both input tables or result sets. It                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
effectively identifies the common elements between the two datasets. Options B, C, and D are incorrect in this                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
scenario. MERGE is typically used for updating or inserting data based on matching conditions, not for findingcommon values. MINUS (also sometimes called EXCEPT) returns rows from the first table that are not present                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
in the second, effectively finding the differences. UNION combines the rows from two tables, including                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
duplicates with UNION ALL, or distinct rows with just UNION, but doesn't isolate only the shared elements.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Therefore, if the goal is to identify numeric values present in both tables, INTERSECT is the appropriate set                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
operator to use. Snowflake's SQL functionality provides robust support for set operations, aligning with                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
standard SQL practices.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
For further research, you can consult the official Snowflake documentation on set operators:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Snowflake Documentation on INTERSECT: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/operatorsset.html#intersect                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Snowflake Documentation on Set Operators: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/operatorsset.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
A view is defined on a permanent table. A temporary table with the same name is created in the same schema as                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
the referenced table.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
What will the query from the view return?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. The data from the permanent table.<br>B. The data from the temporary table.<br>C. An error stating that the view could not be compiled.<br>D. An error stating that the referenced object could not be uniquely identified.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Here's a detailed justification for why the answer is B. The data from the temporary table.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
In Snowflake, temporary tables exist within a user's session and are not persistent. They have precedence                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
over permanent tables when referenced by name within the same schema and session. When a view is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
created, it's bound to the underlying object's identifier, not its specific data at the time of creation. When a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
query executes using the view, Snowflake first checks for objects matching the view's definition within the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
user's session and scope. Because the temporary table with the same name exists within the same schema as                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
the view's underlying table, it is found first due to its session-specific scope, overriding the visibility of the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
permanent table with the same name. The view thus retrieves data from the temporary table instead of the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
permanent one. Snowflakeâ€™s name resolution prioritizes temporary objects, session-scoped objects over                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
permanent ones when thereâ€™s ambiguity in a user session. Hence, the query from the view will retrieve data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
from the temporary table, option B. Creating a temporary table with the same name as a permanent one in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
same schema, session-specific precedence in object resolution in snowflake is demonstrated here.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Authoritative Links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Documentation on Temporary Tables: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/tables-temptransient (Specifically highlighting the session-scoped nature of temporary tables and their precedence)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Snowflake Documentation on Views: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/create-view (While                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
this doesn't explicitly mention temporary table precedence, it provides context on view definitions and object                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
resolution)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Snowflake Documentation on Object Names: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/identifiers-syntax                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
(Details about object name precedence and resolution in Snowflake.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which pages are included in the Activity area of Snowsight? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Contacts<br>B. Sharing settings<br>C. Copy History<br>D. Query History<br>E. Automatic Clustering History                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C. Copy History and D. Query History. Snowsight's Activity area is primarily designed to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
provide insights into the operational aspects of your Snowflake environment. This includes tracking data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
loading activities and query execution. The "Copy History" page specifically displays detailed information                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
about data loading operations, such as COPY INTO commands, including the files loaded, status of the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
operation, and any errors encountered. This allows users to monitor and troubleshoot data ingestion                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
processes efficiently. The "Query History" page, on the other hand, provides a comprehensive view of all                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
queries executed within your Snowflake account. It shows details like the query text, execution time, user                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
who ran the query, and status, enabling performance analysis and identification of resource-intensive queries.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Options A and B, "Contacts" and "Sharing settings," are not found within the Activity area. Contacts relate to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
user management and potentially roles within the system, while Sharing settings are associated with data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
sharing configurations, typically found under different navigation sections in Snowsight or Snowflake's                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
general management interface. Therefore, the activity area focuses on operational tracking and monitoring as                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
evidenced by its inclusion of query and copy histories. The inclusion of these pages aligns with fundamental                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
cloud database management practices, providing insights into the "data plane" activities of a cloud database                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
like Snowflake.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Authoritative Links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Documentation on Copy History: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/data-load-history                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Snowflake Documentation on Query History: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-query-history                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Snowflake Documentation on Snowsight: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-snowsight                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What can a Snowflake user do in the Activity section in Snowsight?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Create dashboards.<br>B. Write and run SQL queries.<br>C. Explore databases and objects.<br>D. Explore executed query performance.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is D, "Explore executed query performance." The Activity section in Snowsight,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake's web UI, is primarily focused on providing insights into past query executions. This area allows                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
users to examine the performance of queries, identify bottlenecks, and understand resource consumption.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Options A, B, and C represent functionalities found in other Snowsight sections. Dashboards are created in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Dashboards section, while writing and running SQL queries happens in the Worksheets section. Database and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
object exploration is done via the Data section. The Activity section concentrates on the historical                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
performance data of queries. This performance data includes metrics like query execution time, processing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
time, and the number of scanned rows. These metrics are crucial for identifying and optimizing slow-running                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
queries, ultimately improving overall Snowflake performance and cost efficiency. By analyzing query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
performance within the Activity section, users can make informed decisions about query optimization,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
resource allocation, and even schema design. This is a critical aspect of managing a data warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
effectively. Snowflake's documentation validates this focus on query history and performance within the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Activity section. Further information on query history and the Activity section in Snowsight can be found in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
official Snowflake documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-snowsight-activity                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What statistical information in a Query Profile indicates that the query is too large to fit in memory? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Bytes spilled to local cache.<br>B. Bytes spilled to local storage.<br>C. Bytes spilled to remote cache.<br>D. Bytes spilled to remote storage.<br>E. Bytes spilled to remote metastore.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B and D: Bytes spilled to local storage and Bytes spilled to remote storage. These                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
metrics within a Snowflake Query Profile directly indicate that a query's intermediate result sets have                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
exceeded the available memory allocated to the executing compute resources, thus requiring overflow to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
disk.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
When a Snowflake query processes large datasets, the intermediate results, such as those produced during                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
joins or aggregations, are initially held in memory for speed. If the data volume surpasses available RAM,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Snowflake's query processing engine begins to 'spill' data. This spilling happens first to local storage                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
associated with the compute node where the query is running (option B). If this storage is insufficient, the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
overflow is directed to remote storage like an Amazon S3 bucket (option D) in cloud environments.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
'Bytes spilled to local cache' (option A) and 'Bytes spilled to remote cache' (option C) are related to caching                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
mechanisms designed to improve performance by retrieving reusable data segments. They do not signify                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
memory pressure due to active query processing that exceeds memory limits. 'Bytes spilled to remote                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
metastore' (option E) refers to an entirely different context, involving metadata and not query data overflows.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Therefore, when analyzing the Query Profile for memory-related issues, spilled bytes to local or remote                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
storage are the key indicators. This suggests the query size is too large for the available resources, leading to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
a decline in performance as I/O operations are introduced. In summary, observing significant amounts of bytes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
spilled to either local or remote storage directly reveals the lack of adequate memory for the query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
processing.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Further Reading:Snowflake Documentation on Query Profile: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-query-profile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Snowflake Spilling: https://community.snowflake.com/s/article/What-is-Spilling-in-Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What can a Snowflake user do with the information included in the details section of a Query Profile?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Determine the total duration of the query.<br>B. Determine the role of the user who ran the query.<br>C. Determine the source system that the queried table is from.<br>D. Determine if the query was on structured or semi-structured data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The details section of a Snowflake Query Profile provides a granular breakdown of a query's execution,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
focusing on performance characteristics. This includes the total duration of the query, which is a crucialmetric for understanding how long a query took to complete. This total duration is often broken down into                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
different stages like compilation, execution, and result delivery, allowing users to identify bottlenecks.
