targeted performance optimization efforts.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
For further research, refer to the official Snowflake documentation on Query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Profiles:https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-queryprofile.htmlhttps://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/functions/query_history.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which common query problems are identified by the Query Profile? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Syntax error<br>B. Inefficient pruning<br>C. Ambiguous column names<br>D. Queries too large to fit in memory<br>E. Object does not exist or not authorized                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The Query Profile in Snowflake is a powerful tool designed to analyze query execution and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
pinpoint performance bottlenecks. Option B, "Inefficient pruning," is correct because the Query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Profile visualizes how Snowflake filters data during processing. Poor pruning, where Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
scans more data than necessary, can dramatically slow down query execution. The profile                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
highlights stages where large amounts of data are read but ultimately discarded, indicating                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
opportunities for optimization using techniques like clustered tables or more selective filtering.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Option D, "Queries too large to fit in memory," is also accurate. The Query Profile provides                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
insights into the memory consumption of various query operators. If a query exceeds available                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
memory, it may result in spilling to disk, which is significantly slower. This allows users to identify                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
and address issues causing excessive memory usage, such as large intermediate result sets or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
inefficient data transformations. Options A, C, and E are incorrect because they represent issuescaught before or outside the actual query execution captured in the Query Profile. Syntax errors                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
are detected during query parsing, not execution. Ambiguous column names are SQL semantic                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
issues that occur earlier in the process. An object not existing or lacking authorization prevents                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
the query from starting, not a performance issue within the query's execution as shown by the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
profile.

https://docs.snowflake.com/en/ui/query-profile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Snowflake Documentation - Query Performance Optimization:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/performance-optimizing-queries.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
How can the Query Profile be used to identify the costliest operator of a query?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Select any node in the operator tree and look at the number of micro-partitions scanned.<br>B. Find the operator node with the highest fraction of time or percentage of total time.<br>C. Select the TableScan operator node and look at the percentage scanned from cache.<br>D. Look at the number of rows between operator nodes across the operator tree.                                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B, focusing on the operator node with the highest time fraction or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
percentage. Snowflake's Query Profile provides a detailed, hierarchical breakdown of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
query execution. Each operator in the execution plan consumes time and resources,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
contributing to the overall query cost. By examining the profile, one can pinpoint                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
bottlenecks. Option B directly addresses cost identification by highlighting the operator                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
consuming the most processing time. This aligns with the fundamental concept of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
resource consumption in cloud data warehousing. A higher time fraction or percentage                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
signifies a larger resource investment. Option A, focusing solely on micro-partitions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
scanned, is relevant, but not a direct cost indicator. Option C, scanning percentage from                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
cache, is valuable for performance tuning but not for cost analysis directly. Option D, row                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
count between operators, might hint at processing complexity but does not point to the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
most resource-intensive part. The Query Profile uses time consumption as a key                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
indicator of resource utilization, aligning with how Snowflake tracks costs. Analyzing the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
percentage of time spent on each operator allows for targeted optimization. Therefore,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
identifying the operator with the highest time fraction or percentage is the most direct                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
approach to finding the costliest query component.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Further Research:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake Query Profile Documentation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Understanding Query Processing in Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which statistics are displayed in a Query Profile that indicate that intermediate results do not fit in memory?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
(Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Bytes scanned<br>B. Partitions scanned<br>C. Bytes spilled to local storage<br>D. Bytes spilled to remote storage<br>E. Percentage scanned from cache                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C and D: "Bytes spilled to local storage" and "Bytes spilled to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
remote storage." These metrics within a Snowflake Query Profile directly indicate that                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
intermediate results exceeded available memory during query processing. When a query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
generates intermediate data larger than what can be held in memory, Snowflake begins                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
"spilling" this data to disk. Spilling to local storage, usually SSDs attached to the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
compute nodes, is the first resort. If local storage also fills up, Snowflake further spills                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
to remote storage, typically cloud object storage (like AWS S3, Azure Blob Storage, or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Google Cloud Storage). This spilling signifies a performance penalty, as disk I/O is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
significantly slower than memory access. Increased bytes spilled to either local or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
remote storage indicate that the query likely needs optimization or a larger warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
size to handle the workload within memory limits. Conversely, "Bytes scanned,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
"Partitions scanned," and "Percentage scanned from cache" are related to the input data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
being accessed, not the size of the intermediate results. These metrics describe how                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
efficiently Snowflake reads data from its storage layer. Therefore, they don't                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
specifically point towards memory overflow during processing. They are related to data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
retrieval, not data storage during the query execution.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
Further Research:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake Documentation on Query Profiles: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/ui/queryprofile.html This page provides detailed explanations of each metric visible within the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Snowflake Query Profile.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Snowflake Documentation on Query Execution: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/querying-concepts.html This section gives an overview of the query processing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
lifecycle within Snowflake which helps to understand the context of memory usage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake Blog on Query Optimization: (Search the official blog for relevant articles onspill and query optimization). The snowflake blog provides numerous articles on                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
optimizing queries for better performance and how to understand and address spills                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which categories are included in the execution time summary in a Query Profile? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Pruning<br>B. Spilling<br>C. Initialization<br>D. Local Disk I/O<br>E. Percentage of data read from cache                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C and D, Initialization and Local Disk I/O, respectively. Snowflake'sQuery Profile provides a detailed breakdown of query execution, including how time is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
spent across various operations. Initialization encompasses the time taken to prepare                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
the query for execution, which includes steps like parsing, planning, and compiling the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
SQL statement. This is crucial as it sets the stage for all subsequent operations. Local                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Disk I/O refers to the time spent reading and writing data on local disks within the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake virtual warehouse nodes. This is a significant factor in overall query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
performance, especially if data isn't readily available in memory or cache. Pruning (A) is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
a data optimization strategy which reduces the data scanned by a query and doesn't                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
contribute to execution time, but saves time by skipping the scanning of irrelevant                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
micro-partitions. Spilling (B) occurs when intermediate results donâ€™t fit in memory,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
requiring data to be written to disk. While it affects performance, Spilling doesn't fall                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
under the standard execution time summary categories. Percentage of data read from                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
cache (E) is about the efficiency of data access, rather than execution time categories                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
themselves. It reflects how much data was readily retrieved from cache rather than                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
accessing storage. The time taken for this retrieval is implicitly captured within the other                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
categories and not explicitly part of the execution time summary. Therefore,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Initialization and Local Disk I/O are the specific, detailed categories included in the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
execution time summary in a Snowflake Query Profile, reflecting the preparations and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
data transfer activities essential to query execution.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
For further research, consult the official Snowflake documentation on the Query Profile:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/ui/query-profile.html and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/sql/explain.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which statistics on a Query Profile reflect the efficiency of the query pruning? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Partitions scanned<br>B. Partitions total<br>C. Bytes scanned<br>D. Bytes spilled<br>E. Bytes written                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A, B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is A. Partitions scanned and B. Partitions total. These two statistics                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
from a Snowflake Query Profile directly relate to query pruning effectiveness. Query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
pruning is a crucial optimization technique where Snowflake avoids scanningunnecessary data partitions, thereby improving query performance and reducing cost.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Partitions total represents the total number of data partitions available for the table(s)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
involved in the query. It acts as the baseline or the maximum possible scan space.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Partitions scanned, on the other hand, shows the actual number of partitions that                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Snowflake read during query execution. A significant difference between 'Partitions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
total' and 'Partitions scanned' suggests efficient pruning. If many partitions were                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
pruned, this means Snowflake has successfully filtered out irrelevant data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Options C, D, and E, while important performance indicators, do not directly represent                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
query pruning effectiveness. Bytes scanned indicates the volume of data read, but this is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
a result of the pruning, not the pruning itself. Bytes spilled refers to data written to local                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
disk due to insufficient memory, and Bytes written generally refers to result data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Efficient pruning reduces bytes scanned, but they aren't the best indicators for the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
pruning's success. The key aspect is analyzing how many partitions were skipped, i.e.,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
the gap between total partitions and scanned partitions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Therefore, by comparing the total number of partitions with the number of partitions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
actually scanned, we can directly gauge how effective the query pruning mechanism was                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
in avoiding unnecessary data reads. Efficient pruning minimizes Partitions scanned                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
compared to Partitions total.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
For further research, refer to the following Snowflake documentation links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Understanding the Query Profile: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/ui/query-profile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Query Pruning: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/querying-pruning.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Optimization and Performance: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/performance-optimization.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What issues can be identified and troubleshooted using the Query Profile? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Full index scans<br>B. Cartesian products<br>C. Insufficient privileges<br>D. Queries too large to fit in memory<br>E.
