Virtual warehouse credit consumption                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answers are B. Cartesian products and D. Queries too large to fit in memory.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
The Snowflake Query Profile is a powerful tool for analyzing query execution and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
identifying performance bottlenecks. It provides a detailed, visual breakdown of how a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
query is processed by Snowflake.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
B. Cartesian Products: Query profiles clearly show when a Cartesian product has                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
occurred. This is characterized by a JOIN operation where the number of rows produced                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
is significantly higher than either of the input tables. This typically indicates a missing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
join condition or an incorrect join type, leading to exponentially increased processing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
times and resource consumption. Spotting this in a query profile allows users to refine                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
the join logic, drastically improving performance.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
D. Queries too large to fit in memory: The Query Profile can show where a query is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
encountering issues with memory. This is usually indicated by operations spilling to disk.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
When data exceeds the memory available in the execution nodes, Snowflake has to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
utilize slower disk storage for temporary data storage, resulting in significant                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
performance degradation. Identifying such scenarios allows for optimizations, like                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
limiting the data scanned or scaling up the warehouse size to allocate more memory                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
resources.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
A. Full index scans: While the query profile does indicate which table is being scanned, it                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
does not explicitly state whether a full index scan occurred or not. Index usage details                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
are less explicit in the query profile and require deeper understanding of Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
query planner.C. Insufficient privileges: Insufficient privilege issues cause a query to fail                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
before execution. This will not be indicated in the Query Profile as the profile is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
generated for successfully executed queries.E. Virtual warehouse credit consumption:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Query profile shows breakdown of execution time by node and stage, but it doesn't                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
directly reveal cost in credits. While indirectly tied to execution time, credit consumptionis evaluated outside of the profile analysis.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Here are some resources for more information:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Snowflake Documentation on Query Profile: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/ui/queryprofile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Understanding Cartesian Joins: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cartesian_product                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
In summary, Query Profile allows identification of Cartesian products (inefficient joins)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
and memory related spillages(queries exceeding available memory) through                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
visualization of query execution plan.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which statistics can be used to identify queries that have inefficient pruning? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Bytes scanned<br>B. Bytes written to result<br>C. Partitions scanned<br>D. Partitions total<br>E. Percentage scanned from cache                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answers are C. Partitions scanned and D. Partitions total. These statistics                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
directly relate to how well Snowflake is pruning data during query execution.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
Inefficient pruning means the query is scanning more data than necessary. Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
stores data in micro-partitions. When a query is executed, Snowflake uses metadata to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
filter out (prune) micro-partitions that do not contain relevant data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Partitions scanned indicates the number of micro-partitions actually read during query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
execution. A higher number of partitions scanned relative to the total number of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
partitions suggests ineffective pruning.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Partitions total represents the total number of micro-partitions available for the table or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
partition being queried. Comparing "partitions scanned" with "partitions total" helps                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
assess pruning efficiency. Ideally, a well-written query will only scan a small fraction of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
the total partitions.High values for "partitions scanned" in relation to "partitions total" indicate that the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
query might be scanning many micro-partitions that don't contain the desired data. This                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
can be due to poor filter conditions in the WHERE clause, complex joins, or missing or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
outdated clustering information.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Bytes scanned (A), while important for performance analysis, reflects the overall volume                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
of data read and can be high even with efficient pruning if the relevant data itself is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
large. Bytes written to result (B) is about the data returned by the query, not the data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
scanned for query processing. Percentage scanned from cache (E) reveals whether the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
data was accessed from the cache, however, it does not directly reveal inefficient                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
pruning.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Therefore, focusing on the ratio of Partitions scanned (C) to Partitions total (D) is the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
most effective way to identify queries suffering from inefficient pruning.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Authoritative Links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Documentation on Query Profile: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/ui/queryprofile.html (Focus on the sections regarding scan and partitions)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
Snowflake Documentation on Micro-partitions: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/tables-clustering-micropartitions.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Snowflake Documentation on Pruning: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sqlreference/constructs/pruning.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which element in the Query Profile interface shows the relationship between the nodes in the execution of a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
query?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Node List<br>B. Steps<br>C. Overview<br>D. Operator Tree                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is D. Operator Tree. The Query Profile interface in Snowflake                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
provides a detailed breakdown of query execution, and the Operator Tree is specifically                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
designed to visually represent the relationships between different processing nodes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
involved in that execution. This tree structure shows how data flows and transforms as it                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
moves through the query plan. Each node in the tree represents a specific operation like                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
table scan, join, or aggregation. The connections between the nodes indicate the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
direction of data flow. This hierarchical view is essential for understanding the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
performance implications of different operations and for identifying bottlenecks.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Options A, B, and C represent other parts of the Query Profile, but do not primarily focus                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
on the relationships between nodes. The Node List provides information about each                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
individual node, Steps details the sequence of operations, and the Overview offers a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
high-level summary. The Operator Tree, on the other hand, is explicitly designed to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
illuminate the interdependencies between nodes within the query execution plan,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
providing a holistic view of data transformation and flow.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Authoritative Links:Snowflake Documentation - Using Query Profile:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/ui/query-profile.html (This link provides a general                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
overview of the query profile, including a section on the operator tree)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Snowflake Blog - Understanding Query Execution with Query Profile: (You may need to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
search for this on the Snowflake Blog, specific links may vary). This blog often provides                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
in-depth explanations and use cases.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What is the relationship between a Query Profile and a virtual warehouse?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. A Query Profile can help users right-size virtual warehouses.<br>B. A Query Profile defines the hardware specifications of the virtual warehouse.<br>C. A Query Profile can help determine the number of virtual warehouses available.<br>D. A Query Profile automatically scales the virtual warehouse based on the query complexity.                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Here's a detailed justification for why option A is the correct answer:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
A Query Profile in Snowflake provides a detailed breakdown of a query's execution,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
including resource consumption like CPU usage, I/O operations, and data scanned. This                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
information is crucial for performance analysis and optimization. One key aspect of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
optimization is right-sizing your virtual warehouse. A virtual warehouse is Snowflake's                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
compute engine, and selecting the appropriate size directly impacts cost and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
performance. An undersized warehouse may lead to slow query execution, while an                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
oversized one can waste resources.By examining the Query Profile, a user can identify bottlenecks or areas where resources                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
are underutilized. For instance, if a query consistently consumes minimal CPU but                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
performs substantial data scans, it might suggest that the warehouse size is not the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
limiting factor. Conversely, high CPU usage and long execution times might indicate that                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
a larger warehouse is needed. The insights gained from the Query Profile, therefore,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
provide the necessary data points to make informed decisions about resizing the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
warehouse to meet the workload demands efficiently.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Options B, C, and D are incorrect. A Query Profile doesn't define the hardware                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
specifications of the virtual warehouse (B); this is configured during warehouse creation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
It also doesn't determine the number of available warehouses (C); this is an account                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
configuration. Lastly, the Query Profile doesnâ€™t automatically scale a warehouse (D);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
scaling is performed through configuration or Snowflake's auto-scaling feature, not                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
directly by the profile itself. The profile merely provides insight into the need for scaling.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
Therefore, the correct relationship between a Query Profile and a virtual warehouse is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
that a Query Profile's analysis helps users effectively right-size their virtual warehouses                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
for optimal performance and cost efficiency.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Authoritative Links:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Documentation on Query Profiles: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/ui-query-profile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Snowflake Documentation on Virtual Warehouses: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Snowflake Documentation on Warehouse Sizing: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/warehouses-considerations.html#sizing-a-virtual-warehouse                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which common query issues can be identified by the Query Profile? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Insufficient credit quota<br>B. Inefficient query pruning<br>C. Excessive query pruning<br>D. Exploding joins<br>E. Credit usage that exceeds a set threshold                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The Query Profile in Snowflake is a powerful tool for analyzing query execution andidentifying performance bottlenecks. It provides detailed information about the different                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
stages of a query, enabling users to pinpoint areas for optimization. Option B, "Inefficient                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
query pruning," is a common issue revealed by the Query Profile. Query pruning is the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
process of eliminating unnecessary data partitions during a query scan. Inefficient                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
pruning occurs when the query scans more partitions than it needs to, resulting in longer                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
execution times and higher resource consumption. The Query Profile visualizes which                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
partitions are being scanned, making it easy to identify ineffective pruning patterns.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Option D, "Exploding joins," is another common problem diagnosable via the Query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
Profile. An exploding join occurs when a join operation results in a significant increase in                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
the number of rows, often due to a lack of proper join conditions or mismatched data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
cardinalities. The Query Profile displays the number of rows flowing through each join                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
operation, which helps to detect exploding joins. This allows you to optimize your joins,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
for instance, by adding more appropriate join conditions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Option A, "Insufficient credit quota," isnâ€™t directly displayed in a query profile. While low                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
quotas may cause queries to fail and slow the system overall, they are not specific                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
performance issues identified within the execution details provided by the query profile.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
It relates more to account settings and limitations.
