Similarly, option C, "Excessive query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
pruning", implies that the data scanned is smaller than it needs to be. While this scenario                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
is possible, this is usually beneficial for query performance as less data would be                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
scanned and is thus not considered an issue. Option E, "Credit usage that exceeds a set                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
threshold," while also an important factor for costs and budgeting, it's not something                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
that the Query Profile can tell you by itself. Snowflake monitors credits used but the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Query Profile shows you how your credits were spent by the query, not whether it                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
exceeded a threshold you set separately. Therefore, the correct answers, B and D,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
showcase issues where the Query Profile's execution breakdown provides a direct                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
insight to performance optimization.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Authoritative links for further research:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Snowflake Query Profile Documentation: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/uiquery-profile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Snowflake Join Optimization: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sqlreference/constructs/join-optimization.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Snowflake Data Pruning: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/tables-clusteringkeys.html#benefits-of-clustering-and-pruning                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
In Snowflake, what allows users to perform recursive queries?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. QUALIFY<br>B. LATERAL<br>C. PIVOT<br>D. CONNECT BY                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is D. CONNECT BY. Snowflake, unlike some traditional relational                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
databases, does not have explicit support for Common Table Expressions (CTEs) with                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
recursive definitions. Instead, it provides the CONNECT BY clause to achieve hierarchicalor recursive data querying. CONNECT BY is a proprietary syntax used to traverse parentchild relationships within a single table. This clause starts from a root row and then                                                                                                                                                                                               
iteratively follows the relationship defined in the CONNECT BY condition. This is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
essential for handling data organized in trees or graphs, such as organizational                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
structures, bill of materials, or network topologies. The other options, QUALIFY,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
LATERAL, and PIVOT, serve different purposes. QUALIFY is used to filter results based                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
on window functions. LATERAL allows subqueries to reference columns from previous                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
FROM clauses, typically used for complex data manipulations. PIVOT transforms rows                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
into columns, which is unsuitable for recursive data exploration. Therefore, CONNECT                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
BY is the specific mechanism within Snowflake designed to handle queries that explore                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
recursive or hierarchical data structures. The clause supports conditions like PRIOR to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
reference the parent row values in order to traverse the structure correctly and to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
prevent infinite loops. These functionalities are core to retrieving data organized                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
recursively.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
Relevant Snowflake documentation can be found here:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
CONNECT BY: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/constructs/connect-by                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
QUALIFY: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/constructs/qualify                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
LATERAL: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/constructs/lateral                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
PIVOT: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/constructs/pivot                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which Query Profile operator is considered a DML operator?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. ExternalScan<br>B. Flatten<br>C. Merge<br>D. Sort                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C, Merge. Within Snowflake's Query Profile, operators represent                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
the steps taken to execute a query. DML (Data Manipulation Language) operators are                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
those that modify data within tables. Merge is a DML operation used to insert, update, or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
delete data based on matching conditions between a source and target table. It's a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
combined operation that performs all of these manipulations within a single statement.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
ExternalScan (A) reads data from external sources without modifying Snowflake data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Flatten (B) transforms semi-structured data into relational rows, also not a DML                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
operation. Sort (D) rearranges data order, which also doesn't modify the stored data.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Therefore, among the options, only Merge directly impacts the data in a table, making it                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
a DML operator. The other listed operators primarily handle data retrieval and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
transformation for processing without changing the underlying data storage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Understanding the distinction between DDL, DML, and DQL operations is essential when                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
analyzing query performance and data modification within Snowflake.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
For further research:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Snowflake documentation on MERGE: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sqlreference/sql/merge.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
Snowflake documentation on Query Profile: https://docs.snowflake.com/en/userguide/ui-query-profile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
General concept of DML, DDL, and DQL:https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_manipulation_language                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which table function is used to perform additional processing on the results of a previously-run query?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. QUERY_HISTORY<br>B. RESULT_SCAN<br>C. DESCRIBE_RESULTS<br>D. QUERY_HISTORY_BY_SESSION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B. RESULT_SCAN.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
The RESULT_SCAN table function in Snowflake allows you to access and process the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
results of a previously executed query. It retrieves the result set of a specified query ID.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
This enables you to perform further analysis, aggregation, or transformation on the data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
that was already retrieved by the initial query, without re-executing the original query.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
QUERY_HISTORY and QUERY_HISTORY_BY_SESSION (options A and D) provide                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
metadata about past queries, like start time, end time, user, and SQL text. They don't                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
provide access to the results of those queries. DESCRIBE_RESULTS (option C) is not a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
valid Snowflake function.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
The ability to access and manipulate query results through RESULT_SCAN is beneficial                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
in several scenarios. For example, you might use it to apply a window function to a set of                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
results retrieved by a simpler query, or to consolidate data that comes from multiple                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
separate queries into a single result set. It helps optimize resource utilization and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
performance by avoiding redundant data retrieval. Using RESULT_SCAN, you can                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
directly build on the results of a previous query instead of re-running the base query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
again, potentially reducing processing time and cost. It also facilitates complex data                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
manipulation by chaining query processing steps.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
For further details on RESULT_SCAN, refer to the Snowflake documentation:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/functions/result_scan.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
How can the Query Profile be used to troubleshoot a problematic query?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. It will indicate if a virtual warehouse memory is too small to run the query.<br>B. It will indicate if a user lacks the privileges needed to run the query.<br>C. It will indicate if a virtual warehouse is in auto-scale mode.<br>D. It will indicate if the user has enough Snowflake credits to run the query.                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The Correct answer is ["A"]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Using which object-level parameters will help limit query processing and concurrency slowdowns? (Choose two.)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. MULTI_STATEMENT_COUNT<br>B. ENABLE_QUERY_ACCELERATION<br>C. STATEMENT_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS<br>D. STATEMENT_QUEUED_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS<br>E. QUERY_ACCELERATION_MAX_SCALE_FACTOR                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>C, D</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is C and D: STATEMENT_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
STATEMENT_QUEUED_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS. These parameters directly control the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
lifespan of queries and how long they can wait in the queue, respectively, contributing to                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
preventing query processing and concurrency slowdowns.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
STATEMENT_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS dictates the maximum time a query can execute.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
If a query exceeds this limit, it is automatically terminated, preventing it from consuming                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
resources indefinitely and potentially blocking other queries. This helps in addressing                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
runaway queries or poorly optimized queries that could otherwise bog down the system.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
STATEMENT_QUEUED_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS defines the maximum time a query will                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
remain in the queue waiting for resources. If this timeout is reached, the query is                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
cancelled. This parameter is crucial in preventing a build-up of queries waiting for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
resources, which can happen under heavy load. By automatically canceling queries that                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
have been waiting too long, Snowflake can better prioritize active queries and maintainoverall system responsiveness. Without this timeout, a backlog of queued queries could                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
starve new queries, leading to significant performance degradation.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Option A, MULTI_STATEMENT_COUNT, relates to the number of statements that can be                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
executed within a multi-statement request and doesn't directly affect query slowdowns.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Option B, ENABLE_QUERY_ACCELERATION, is intended to speed up queries that meet                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
specific criteria using cloud services and resources specifically for query optimization.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
While this can mitigate some slowdowns, it's a performance enhancement rather than a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
direct limiter. Option E, QUERY_ACCELERATION_MAX_SCALE_FACTOR, governs the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
maximum scale factor for the query acceleration service, essentially controlling the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
degree of acceleration that can be applied. While related to performance, it doesnâ€™t                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
directly limit processing time or queue time like C and D.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Therefore, STATEMENT_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS and                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
STATEMENT_QUEUED_TIMEOUT_IN_SECONDS are the most relevant parameters for                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
limiting query processing time and preventing concurrency slowdowns by actively                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
managing query execution and queuing. They offer a direct method for controlling                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
resource consumption and maintaining a responsive system under load.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
Refer to the Snowflake documentation for more information on these parameters:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/sql-reference/parameters#object-parameters                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/query-acceleration-service                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
What does a Query Profile metric that shows excessive spillage indicate?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Poor query optimization<br>B. Expired temporary tables<br>C. Improper virtual warehouse sizing<br>D. Improper Common Table Expressions (CTEs)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The Correct answer is ["A"]
