</details>

A complex query has been running in Snowsight for more than one hour. At the same time, several other queries                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
from other worksheets ran successfully.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
What is FASTEST way to cancel the long-running query?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Immediately suspend the virtual warehouse that the query is running on.<br>B. Return to the worksheet and abort the query.<br>C. Set the auto_suspend virtual warehouse property to 0.<br>D. Find the query in the query activity view and cancel the query.                                                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The Correct answer is ["B"]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
</details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which command can be performed on a Snowflake secure view?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. SELECT<br>B. INSERT<br>C. UPDATE<br>D. DELETE                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>

---                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Which Query Profile operator provides information on pruning efficiency?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. TableScan<br>B. ExternalScan<br>C. InternalObject<br>D. Generator                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>B</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
The correct answer is B, ExternalScan. Query profiles in Snowflake are invaluable tools                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
for performance tuning and understanding query execution. The ExternalScan operator                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
specifically focuses on reading data from external stages like Amazon S3, Google Cloud                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Storage, or Azure Blob Storage. Pruning efficiency directly relates to how effectively                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
Snowflake can filter out unnecessary partitions or files during the read operation from                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
these external sources. A high pruning efficiency means Snowflake is reading only the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
required data, minimizing I/O and improving performance. The ExternalScan operator's                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
details show how many files were considered versus how many were actually scanned,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
indicating the effectiveness of pruning. The TableScan operator relates to data read                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
from Snowflake tables, while InternalObject is often associated with metadata or                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
internal data handling. Generator nodes are generally for creating data on the fly. While                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
TableScan can be affected by micro-partition pruning, ExternalScan directly reflects the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
efficiency of pruning operations performed on the external data source based on the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
query's filter conditions and the partitioning scheme of the external data. LowExternalScan pruning efficiency suggests issues like missing or insufficient partitioning,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
inefficient data formats, or inadequate statistics on the external data. Investigating the                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
statistics collected from external data is useful for helping with query pruning.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Improving pruning efficiency for ExternalScan operations can significantly reduce query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
execution time and cost. Therefore, ExternalScan directly presents pruning efficiency                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
information, making it the correct answer.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Here's a resource for more information on Snowflake Query                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
Profiles:https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/ui-query-profile.html                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
</details>

Which schema-level objects allow the user to periodically perform an action under specific conditions, based on                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
data within Snowflake?                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Alerts<br>B. External tables<br>C. Secure views<br>D. Materialized views                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<details>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
<summary><strong>âœ… Answer : </strong></summary>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
<strong>A</strong>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
A. Alerts.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
Snowflake Alerts are schema-level objects that:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
Run on a schedule (periodically),                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Evaluate a specified condition (based on query results),                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
Trigger an action (such as calling a stored procedure) when the condition is met.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
Run a query every hour to check if a table has more than 1000 failed login attempts.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
If true, send a notification or write to a log table.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
Alerts are explicitly designed to perform actions based on data, under specific                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
conditions, and on a schedule.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
</details>
